entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 'ctor' snippet generate wrong name in nested class #68176

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33712.304 #68184
  • Method Returns string[] But var types as string[]? #53078
  • ToDisplayString for IParameterSymbol adds parameter name nomatter the settings (by default) #67464
    17.7
  • [8.0.100-preview.3.23178.7] Incremental Roslyn Source Generator ToDisplayString() method returns different value in 7.0.20X and later #67632
    17.7
  • [API proposal] Option for displaying standalone parameter names #67478
    17.7

PullRequests

Created

  • Use net8.0 runtime for InlineArray tests #68183
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update interceptors branch from latest main #68182
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Only do LOC for 17.6 #68181
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update compiler tool set version in 17.5 #68180
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add and emit ref kind for ref readonly parameters #68179
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement compile-time boundary checks around inline arrays access. #68178
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Fix 'ctor' snippet in nested class #68177
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid cycle binding tuple type in explicit interface implementation tuple member #68174
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Initial support for collection literal spread elements #67942
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Record added node output states as new #66725
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - Source Generators, Next
  • Display standalone parameter names by default #67857
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Implement more validation for inline array element access and conversion scenarios #68146
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays

Updated

  • Avoid waiting on the thread pool when there is no work to do #68114
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Avoid waiting on the thread pool when there is no work to do #68106
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Use a proper tool bar in Document Outline #68094
    Area-IDE, IDE-Navigation, untriaged, Navigation-Document Outline
  • Fix detection of nested symbols in Document Outline #68107
    Area-IDE, IDE-Navigation, Navigation-Document Outline
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.6 #68171
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Pack bits in SourceOrdinaryMethodSymbol into an existing bitflag structure we have for all source methods #68158
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reuse member names collection in decl tree across edits #67753
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid rooting document instances in NavigateToSearchResult #68068
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement member lookup for extension types #68137
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Add feature to help people move to using primary constructors. #68147
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allow `ref readonly` modifier #68164
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
